title: How We Improved Site Speed by 60%
excerpt: The practical steps, tools, and mindset we used to deliver a snappier experience across our marketing site.
author: Acme Engineering
content:
# Improving Performance

We audited Core Web Vitals and focused on render-blocking resources, image optimization, and caching.

## What We Did
- Eliminated unused JS
- Inlined critical CSS
- Implemented HTTP caching

## Results
We observed a 60% improvement in LCP and a 45% improvement in FID across key pages.
